structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.text: The word "year" as used in KRS 177.580 to 177.630 means calendar year, unless otherwise expressly stated.
law.history: Created 1956 (2nd Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 11, effective June 26, 1956.
